about_the_game:
You wake up in a hypersleep box, with no clue whats is happening. You don't remember nothing, and you are alone. You look around, with almost no lights in here, and the windows allow you to see strange space and lights distortions. It is a small chunk of the gigantic black hole around which you seem to orbit. You also see others boxes, everywhere around you, with something inside of them. But nobody wakes up with you. Because everyone is dead inside. You don't remember nothing... and you are alone.

Now, you have to understand.




EXPLORE A WORLD FULL OF SECRETS

Within the space station (and beyond...), a complete open world awaits you, ready to be explored, dissected and understood! Become a space-detective, and gather all the informations you can to understand how to solves the multiple puzzles and grey areas you will face during your adventure. The mystery behind the destruction of the end gate project must be answered, and with it the reason why you, and only you, are still alive in this world.

Room after room, visiting all kinds of laboratories, discovering objects with different functions, you could even challenge the black hole itself, to explore space and its secrets.

PLAY WITH GRAVITY

The gameplay is gravity-based, with a whole variety of possibilites for you to move and interact with your environment. Flying in zero-gravity, walking on the ceiling, crash into a planet, you will find yourself in all types of situations. Some object are also affected by these gravity changes, creating unique enigmas to solve.

Time and space also have a big part in the gameplay. As some events will occur once, you will have to time travel and play with the black hole consequences, to unlock certains informations. But be prepared, you could find yourself upside down before you know it...



DISCOVER AND FEEL A RICH STORY

Through multiple screens, tablet, and conversations with your holo-companion, a complex and intricate scenario will unfold before your eyes. A big work on sound design and especially music will accompany you throughout your adventure, and reinforce the emotion. Little by little, the past of the station and all of its members will become clearer, and so will yours. You could even find the motivation to achieve the things that your past self couldn't...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2300 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 9300 / AMD Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: You wake up, alone, in a hypersleep box, with no memories left. You find yourself in an enormous space station, orbiting with a strange asteroid, around a gigantic black hole. And now, it's time to search, everywhere, to understand who you were. And most importantly, what's left to do here.
